body.p:
Fayette County Oct 26th 1860
To His Eccellency Beriah Magoffin
Dear Sir

I was fined twenty dollars at the September Term of the Madison Circuit Court For Playing Cards The facts are these It has binn over five years a go I did play Cards in the County of Madison for Amusement with a particular friend of Mine I considerd it No harm and Not against he Laws of my Native State I am poor and have a Family to support I hope you will Interpose your Executive Clemency and Remit the fine and Oblige your friend

B Magoffin Governor of the State of Kentucky
Dear Sir

The above Petitioner Aaron Horn is a Clever Man and a hard worker He is a good Democrat and one of the best working Men I have known him for over Thirty years he has all ways lived in My Neghborhood The Remitting of the fine will Meet the Expectations of your Friends Since the Remitance to Cleavland Fayette County I Remain yours Respectfully

R C Rogers
J. E Rogers
Robt J Breckinridge
B F Graves
Thos. W. Bullock
Chas Wheatly..

Madison
Cir. Ct.
$20. } Gaming
Aaron Horn
Issd ONov 1. 1860
